data.actual_result: The text reappears after vanishing behind the black bar, as there is a space in between two such bars
data.expected_result: The text vanishes behind a black bar
data.short_description: [Website Bug / Android Specific] On the acknowledgement page, the black bar has a space in which the scrolling names are visible
data.steps_to_repro: - go to /acknowledgements or press the acknowledgement button in your android user settings - let the text scroll and observe
